item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

Is one of those intentions a NEW Healthier YOU. Well it is time to take the first step or may the first leap and shape up.

Are you like me, someone who starts a diet on Monday & then wonders what happened by Saturday? Well here's the answer.

Keep Calm and Don't Diet

If you've collected enough evidence that dieting just makes you fatter, join Max Daniels to learn how to lose weight by paying attention to yourself. Max is a weight loss coach who has kept off 50 pounds for years while eating cake and having fun. Using three simple body awareness tools, and a hip-pocket thought-management technique, she will teach you to do the same.

Max Daniels is a weight loss coach trained and certified by Martha Beck. She was raised in Boulder, Colorado, is a longtime meditator and student of Zen, and graduated summa cum laude from Wellesley college. She uses both sides of her brain - the hippie side and the scholar side - to help women end their struggle with food and weight, forever.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the back, closed off, room.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Keep Calm & Don't Diet with Guest Speaker Max Daniels
